00002 * $Id$          uart_irda_transmit.c                            2010-06-07

00025 #include "lpc17xx_uart.h"
00026 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00028 
00029 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00035 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00036 #define UART_PORT 0
00037 
00038 #if (UART_PORT == 0)
00039 #define TEST_UART LPC_UART0
00040 #elif (UART_PORT == 1)
00041 #define TEST_UART (LPC_UART_TypeDef *)UART1
00042 #endif
00043 #define TEST_IRDA LPC_UART3
00044 
00045 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00046 uint8_t menu1[] = "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r";
00047 uint8_t menu2[] = "UART IrDA mode demo \n\r\t MCU LPC17xx - ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r\t UART0 - 9600bps communicates with PC \n\r\t UART3 - 9600bps transmits infrared signals\n\r";
00048 uint8_t menu3[] = "\t\t- Press Esc to terminate this demo \n\r\t\t- Press 'r' to re-print this menu \n\r";
00049 uint8_t menu4[] = "\n\rUART demo terminated!";
00050 uint8_t menu5[] = "\n\rEnter a hex byte value to transmit: 0x";
00051 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00052 void print_menu(void);
00053 
00054 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00055 /*********************************************************************/
00060 void print_menu(void)
00061 {
00062         UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu1, sizeof(menu1), BLOCKING);
00063         UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu2, sizeof(menu2), BLOCKING);
00064         UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu3, sizeof(menu3), BLOCKING);
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00070 /*********************************************************************/
00075 int c_entry(void)
00076 {
00077         // UART Configuration structure variable
00078         UART_CFG_Type UARTConfigStruct;
00079         // UART FIFO configuration Struct variable
00080         UART_FIFO_CFG_Type UARTFIFOConfigStruct;
00081         // Pin configuration for UART
00082         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00083         uint32_t idx,len;
00084         __IO FlagStatus exitflag;
00085         uint8_t buffer,temp;
00086 
00087 #if (UART_PORT == 0)
00088         /*
00089          * Initialize UART0 pin connect
00090          */
00091         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00092         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00093         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00094         PinCfg.Pinnum = 2;
00095         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00096         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);//P0.2 TXD0
00097         PinCfg.Pinnum = 3;
00098         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);//P0.3 RXD0
00099 #endif
00100 
00101 #if (UART_PORT == 1)
00102         /*
00103          * Initialize UART1 pin connect
00104          */
00105         PinCfg.Funcnum = 2;
00106         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00107         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00108         PinCfg.Pinnum = 0;
00109         PinCfg.Portnum = 2;
00110         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00111         PinCfg.Pinnum = 1;
00112         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00113 #endif
00114         /*
00115          * Initialize UART3 pin connect
00116          */
00117         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00118         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00119         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00120         PinCfg.Pinnum = 25;
00121         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00122         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);//P0.25 TXD3
00123 
00124         /* Initialize UART Configuration parameter structure to default state:
00125          * Baudrate = 9600bps
00126          * 8 data bit
00127          * 1 Stop bit
00128          * None parity
00129          */
00130         UART_ConfigStructInit(&UARTConfigStruct);
00131 
00132         // Initialize UART0 & UART3 peripheral with given to corresponding parameter
00133         UART_Init(TEST_UART, &UARTConfigStruct);
00134         UART_Init(TEST_IRDA, &UARTConfigStruct);
00135         /* Initialize FIFOConfigStruct to default state:
00136          *                              - FIFO_DMAMode = DISABLE
00137          *                              - FIFO_Level = UART_FIFO_TRGLEV0
00138          *                              - FIFO_ResetRxBuf = ENABLE
00139          *                              - FIFO_ResetTxBuf = ENABLE
00140          *                              - FIFO_State = ENABLE
00141          */
00142         UART_FIFOConfigStructInit(&UARTFIFOConfigStruct);
00143 
00144         // Initialize FIFO for UART0 & UART3 peripheral
00145         UART_FIFOConfig(TEST_UART, &UARTFIFOConfigStruct);
00146         UART_FIFOConfig(TEST_IRDA, &UARTFIFOConfigStruct);
00147 
00148         //Configure and enable IrDA mode on UART
00149         UART_IrDACmd(TEST_IRDA,ENABLE);
00150         // Enable UART Transmit
00151         UART_TxCmd(TEST_UART, ENABLE);
00152         UART_TxCmd(TEST_IRDA, ENABLE);
00153         // print welcome screen
00154         print_menu();
00155 
00156         // Reset exit flag
00157         exitflag = RESET;
00158         idx=0;buffer=0;
00159 
00160     /* Read some data from the buffer */
00161     while (exitflag == RESET)
00162     {
00163         if(idx==0)
00164         {
00165                 UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu5, sizeof(menu5), BLOCKING);
00166         }
00167         len=0;
00168         while(len==0)
00169         {
00170                 len = UART_Receive(TEST_UART, &temp, 1, NONE_BLOCKING);
00171         }
00172         if(temp==27)
00173         {
00174                 UART_Send(TEST_UART, menu4, sizeof(menu4), BLOCKING);
00175                 exitflag=SET;
00176         }
00177         else if(temp=='r')
00178         {
00179                 idx=0;buffer=0;
00180                 print_menu();
00181                 UART_Send(TEST_IRDA, &buffer, 1, BLOCKING);
00182         }
00183         else
00184         {
00185                 idx++;
00186                 switch(temp)
00187                 {
00188                 case '0': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x00;break;
00189                 case '1': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x01;break;
00190                 case '2': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x02;break;
00191                 case '3': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x03;break;
00192                 case '4': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x04;break;
00193                 case '5': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x05;break;
00194                 case '6': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x06;break;
00195                 case '7': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x07;break;
00196                 case '8': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x08;break;
00197                 case '9': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x09;break;
00198                 case 'a': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0A;break;
00199                 case 'A': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0A;break;
00200                 case 'b': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0B;break;
00201                 case 'B': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0B;break;
00202                 case 'c': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0C;break;
00203                 case 'C': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0C;break;
00204                 case 'd': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0D;break;
00205                 case 'D': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0D;break;
00206                 case 'e': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0E;break;
00207                 case 'E': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0E;break;
00208                 case 'f': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0F;break;
00209                 case 'F': buffer=(buffer<<4)|0x0F;break;
00210                 default: idx=0;buffer=0;break;
00211                 }
00212                 if(idx==2)
00213                 {
00214                         temp=buffer>>4;
00215                         if(temp <= 9)temp=temp+ 0x30;
00216                         else temp=temp+0x37;
00217                         UART_Send(TEST_UART, &temp, 1, BLOCKING);
00218                         temp=(buffer&0x0F);
00219                         if(temp <= 9)temp=temp+ 0x30;
00220                         else temp=temp+0x37;
00221                         UART_Send(TEST_UART, &temp, 1, BLOCKING);
00222 
00223                 UART_Send(TEST_IRDA, &buffer, 1, BLOCKING);
00224                 idx=0;buffer=0;
00225                 }
00226         }
00227     }
00228     // wait for current transmission complete - THR must be empty
00229     while (UART_CheckBusy(TEST_UART) == SET);
00230     while (UART_CheckBusy(TEST_IRDA) == SET);
00231     // DeInitialize UART0 & UART3 peripheral
00232     UART_DeInit(TEST_UART);
00233     UART_DeInit(TEST_IRDA);
00234     /* Loop forever */
00235     while(1);
00236     return 1;
00237 }
00238 
00239 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00240    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00241    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00242    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00243    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00244 int main(void)
00245 {
00246     return c_entry();
00247 }

00265 }
